New Records: Abdullah Shafique became the first Pakistani batter to score a century on World Cup debut
Mohammad Rizwan scored the highest score of 131 not out in the match
Key Match Events: Pakistan successfully chased Sri Lanka's total of 344
Kusal Mendis and Sadeera Samarawickrama scored centuries for Sri Lanka
Mohammad Rizwan batted through cramps to guide Pakistan to victory
Post-Match Reflections: The win boosted Pakistan's morale ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match saw high scores and significant performances from both teams
